articles.title: SAA staff to picket outside offices - eNCA
articles.description: South African Airways staff say so many of the airline's old problems have been inherited by the new airline.
articles.content:

articles.title: South Africa officially off UK red list from today – and what that means - BusinessTech
articles.description: As of Monday 11th October, South Africans travelling to the United Kingdom will no longer have to endure an expensive hotel quarantine, as Covid- related entry rules have been eased.
articles.content:
